sections.heading: Sections, how construed.Sections 43-512 to 43-512
sections.text: 10 and 43-512.12 to 43-512.18 shall be interpreted so as to facilitate the determination of paternity, child, spousal, and medical support enforcement, and the conduct of reviews under such sections.SourceLaws 1976, LB 926, ยง 12;Laws 1978, LB 960, ยง

sections.heading: 43-512 to 43-512.10 and 43-512
sections.text: 12 to 43-512.18 shall be interpreted so as to facilitate the determination of paternity, child, spousal, and medical support enforcement, and the conduct of reviews under such sections.
